COMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #3 from robertdkmarshall/retry-fix add retry to creation of metadata keyspace/table

copy cassandra bin files at packaging time #3 Previously, cassandra binaries were copied from cassandra source code to Elassandra repository which leaded to outdated bins because it requires to manually keep the files synchronized. Now, bins are pulled at packaging time from the cassandra submodule.
